normalized: and so, several days have passed.
tomorrow, yukikaze and rinko will undertake the sheathed mission.
to my surprise, rinko-ane summoned me to the dojo.
our estate has its own kendo hall.
often called the akiyama gym.
our style is the 『ittou-ryuu style』.
founded by the master akiyama soushuu,it has been imparted to taimanin since ancient times.
during the sengoku era, soushuu was appointed to bethe sword instructor of the igawa family by their daimyo.
my father was the 48th head of the family.
he was killed in action several years ago.
this mean i should already be the 49th.
of course, i don't fit the part.
everybody could see that, and i myself never dreamed of it.
thus, the seat of 49th patriarch remains vacant.
for now, rinko-ane is acting as a surrogate,training the 32 followers of the style.
naturally, i am among them.
though no one told me,i'm aware of a rumor that rinko-anemight become the first matriarch of the akiyama house.
it's shameful, but i think so too.
in swordmanship, no, in ninjutsu in general…i cannot imagine the day when i surpass her.
well, anyway――

name: tatsurou
normalized: what is it, rinko-ane?
she's sitting on the floor,and raises her face towards me as i approach.

name: rinko
normalized: you're here…
wearing a pensive expression, she says no more.
it seems something is on her mind.
it is as if she wants to say somethingbut cannot bear to bring it up.
i have rarely seen rinko-ane like this.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-ane?
what's wrong?
only after my puzzled inquiry does she resume talking.

name: rinko
normalized: how have you been recently?
instead of speaking like a girl her age,for some reason, her tone sounds like a father.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what…?
what do you mean?

name: rinko
normalized: well, you know, has anything happened recently?

name: tatsurou
normalized: are you talking about my special camp application?
i've been following an intensive training regimento pass the examination…

name: rinko
normalized: oh, yes…special camp.
that's right.
work hard everyday so that you're selected.
despite her formal answer,that didn't seem to be the subject she had in mind.
it becomes obvious when she doesn't dismiss me,yet lets the conversation dies out, falling silent once again.

name: tatsurou
normalized: soo…rinko-ane, wasn't there something you wanted to tell me?
after i call out to her,rinko-ane looks up suddenly as if she just noticed me.
never before did i see her brooding so.

name: rinko
normalized: something…y-yes.
there's indeed something i wantto talk about…tatsurou, sit there a moment.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes.
i sit on my heels in front of rinko-ane,assuming the same posture as her.

name: rinko
normalized: well then, tatsurou.
rinko-ane starts speaking gently.

name: rinko
normalized: you seem to have been quite happy recently.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
really?

name: rinko
normalized: yeah, and so was yukikaze.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, no…that's, hahaha.
i lose my cool after rinko says so with such a serious face.
thanks to that kiss, we may have acted more cheerful lately.
but that is that.
right now i must focus on training harder than ever.

name: rinko
normalized: did something happen with yukikaze?
rinko-ane leans toward me, anxious for my answer.
her glare is piercing me.
i'd rather keep it a secret, so i avert my eyes.

name: rinko
normalized: i see.
so something did happen…great, well done!
rinko is so overjoyed she slaps her thigh with her hand.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh!?
no, that's…
i was expecting a sermon, so those cheers take me by surprise.
now ignoring my presence, rinko-ane starts mumbling something.

name: rinko
normalized: i see, i see!
i was a bit worried,since i couldn't find a suitable partner.

name: rinko
normalized: well, to be exact i did think of one at once,but obviously i couldn't get in yukikaze's way.
but, you guys went and did it right?
alright, good!

name: tatsurou
normalized: rinko-ane, what are you talking about?

name: rinko
normalized: i'm sure yukikaze will allow it if i'm going second.
while saying that,rinko-ane suddenly stretches her legs out from under her.

name: tatsurou
normalized: going second?
what?

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, i'm sorry, but could you take my virginity now?
some pretty unthinkable words just came out from rinko's mouth.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what!?
at first, i thought i misheard that.
but i actually didn't.

name: rinko
normalized: like i said, i'm asking you to sleep with me.
she repeats herself without a second thought.

name: tatsurou
normalized: s-sleep!?
you and me!?
together!?
e, eeh!?

name: rinko
normalized: that's right.
i'm talking about sex here.
she just sounds angry now.
but, for her to lie invitingly on the dojo's floor,wearing her taimanin uniform, and saying 『let's have sex』――

name: tatsurou
normalized: what the hell!?
you're not making any sense!?

name: rinko
normalized: you heard me, right?
i don't have any ulterior motive here,so it shouldn't be a problem for you.
now, take me!

name: tatsurou
normalized: 『take me!
』 she says.
you and i are siblings.
and what was that about "going second"?
rinko-ane, you're acting a bit――no, really weird.
all this rant gets me in return is a blank stare.

name: rinko
normalized: hmm?
could it be yukikaze didn't tell you?

name: tatsurou
normalized: tell what?!

name: rinko
normalized: you did it with yukikaze, right?!
a rather vague question.

name: tatsurou
normalized: did it…well, k-kiss, yes, but how does thatlead to me and rinko-ane having s-sex!?
rinko goes pop-eyed for a moment,then brings her legs back under her.

name: rinko
normalized: is that so?
never mind then.
she starts getting up as if to signify the end of the conversation.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
wait a second rinko-ane,what was it all about just now?
what?
at this rate she's going to leave me at a loss.
more importantly, i'm worried about her baffling behavior;i really came close to having a heart attack there.
for starters, it's the first time a girlhas told me 『let's make love』.
and it was from someone i admire very much.
now standing,rinko-ane spontaneously turns a candid face towards me.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou, please forget that talk about having sex with me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?

name: rinko
normalized: please forget.

name: tatsurou
normalized: a-aah.
okay.
i'm more likely to forget my own birthday,but i still nod for now.
my consent causes rinko's features to relax.

name: rinko
normalized: but, just supposing.
if you had the opportunityto have sex with me… would you refuse?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh!?
refuse…

name: rinko
normalized: so you would…?
she doesn't seem to be joking…
… but she doesn't look serious either.
i'm lost.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou doesn't want to have sex with me?
being asked so bluntly by a womandoes nothing to alleviate my tension.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i wouldn't refuse.
rinko, you're super pretty…uh…

name: rinko
normalized: so you would have sex?

name: tatsurou
normalized: y-yes.
pressured by rinko,i admit my true feelings as a man.

name: rinko
normalized: i see!
this cheers her up in a flash.

name: rinko
normalized: so tatsurou would have sex with me.
yes, understood.
still smiling at those words, rinko-ane leaves the dojo.
and i remain there alone for a while,torn between confusion and excitement.
the morning after.
yukikaze and rinko-ane are about to depart for the sheathed mission.
even though we didn't plan beforehand,yukikaze is waiting for me on that hill.
since my own father lost his life on a mission,i'm fully aware this could be our final farewell.
in fact, everybody in this village is familiar with this feeling.
this is why on this morning as well,we are talking about mundane subjects.
we did kiss just the other day though, so we're a bit self-conscious.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i should be going soon.
leaving my side, yukikaze stands up.

name: tatsurou
normalized: do your best.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah, you too.
after replying, she stares at me intently.

name: yukikaze
normalized: …i'm going now.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, yeah…
i wonder if she has any more parting words.
her odd attitude baffles me.
she glances down and bites her lip,but then look straight into my eyes.

name: yukikaze
normalized: i…

name: tatsurou
normalized: hmm?

name: yukikaze
normalized: i belong to tatsurou!

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh!?

name: yukikaze
normalized: …i like you, tatsurou.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah…y-yes…i also like you, yukikaze…

name: yukikaze
normalized: then, we're lovers right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes…

name: yukikaze
normalized: no matter what happens, i'll always belong to you, tatsurou.
don't ever forget that!
she's slightly shivering.
unable to contain myself, i embrace her.
besides, i think it's the manly thing to do.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i really will do my best, and become a man worthy of yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah.
i have faith in you.
yukikaze closes her eyes.
that will be our third kiss.
